properties.displayName: Diagnostic Library Sdiageng.DLL Loaded By Msdt.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\sdiageng.dll" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\msdt.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects both of CVE-2022-30190 (Follina) and DogWalk vulnerabilities exploiting msdt.exe binary to load the "sdiageng.dll" library
